RED.label: Avoid
RED.definition: Assume privacy-asset services are blocked (explicit bans or practical inability to obtain regulated rails).
default_team_guidance: Do not offer privacy-asset services (custody, swap, brokerage, payment facilitation) into these jurisdictions without local counsel approval.
Treat partner availability (banks/PSPs/exchanges) as a hard constraint.

AMBER.label: Caution
AMBER.definition: Non-custodial software is often acceptable, but regulated rails are constrained and partner delistings are likely.
default_team_guidance: Prefer wallet-only posture (non-custodial, no hosted signing).
Expect exchange/fiat partner refusals; design fallbacks.

GREEN.label: Friendlier for non-custodial R&D
GREEN.definition: Clearer rules and no categorical ban identified for non-custodial wallet development; still requires AML/partner diligence.
default_team_guidance: Use as preferred bases for R&D, hiring, and release operations.
Maintain non-custodial guardrails; avoid implying evasion.
